main event: A UFO was observed about 4 miles northwest of Oulu, Finland. The object was described as being 'very like a star' and was observed for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was apparently of a silvery color and cylindrical in shape.
The object was sighted flying over a residential area at a high rate of speed, approximately 1500 miles per hour.
The object was observed for approximately 1 minute as it passed overhead at an estimated altitude of 500-600 feet.
No sound was associated with the object and no details of the construction were visible.
The object was tracked both visually and on radar for the duration of the sighting.
